desc: These new and innovative hand sanitizing stations offered by ELK Promotions are a smart and economical way to help keep consumers safe and healthy. The displays simply pop up where ever they're needed like self-service kiosks, schools, restaurants, airports, retail locations, gas stations and ATM machines.

layout.text:
PopUp Sanitizer Stations
FaceShields Made by ELK Employees
and Other Essentials For Your Safety
Simple and effective solutions to keep safety & cleanliness
accessible and affordable
